column4: yes i know. right click an video file. go to properties and open with tab

yeah I know you can do it that way but when I try to open something from the firefox download window (opening it from the net rather than saving to disc first) it always brings up totem which has yet to play anything I have tried with it
send me a link so i can see if mine opens with totem
... That wont matter... I have tried mp3s and dvds and just about everything else I think my installation of totem is screwed but I havent been able to get it working
